mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.apply_value AS "applyValue", a.first_party AS "firstParty", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.enter_value AS "enterValue", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select: select c.id as "id", c.code as "code", c.name as "name" from bm_apply_pay a inner join bm_apply_pay_cont b on a.id=b.apply_pay_id inner join bm_contract c on b.contract_id= c.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bm_apply_pay( id, name, apply_value, first_party, remarks, enter_value, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{applyValue}, #{firstParty}, #{remarks}, #{enterValue}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bm_apply_pay SET name = #{name}, apply_value = #{applyValue}, first_party = #{firstParty}, remarks = #{remarks}, enter_value = #{enterValue}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
